Articles.Content: Since solar panels cannot be fixed on EVA, is there a mod that lests them be? Or did I miss something that was included with stock?
KIS - Kerbal Inventory System - will let you replace a broken panel with a spare one.
Yeah, KIS/KAS is on my "always install" mod list. It gives EVA kerbals something to do. Quite fun.

Bear in mind that KIS doesn't let you actually fix silar panels - it just lets you remove busted ones and attach spares, if you brought some.

OSE Workshop works with KIS to let you recycle and fabricate stuff.
